properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
33 FOOT M/V CROWLEY, WHITE HULL, FIVE PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 38-45.19N 073-03.98W AT 310028Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
INMARSAT-C: 430370670, PHONE: 757 398 6231,
FAX: 757 398 6392, E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
